title: Gamification-integrated mathematics ICT education design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematical Computation Skills and Digital Device Usage Experience
context.additional_context: An adult learner-tailored mathematics education environment for office workers, combining VR simulation and gamification elements to enhance real-life problem-solving abilities

learning_goals: Learners will utilize ICT tools in a VR simulation environment with over 80% accuracy to solve mathematical problems.
Learners will achieve over 70% in learning motivation and collaborative task completion rates by applying gamification elements.
Learners will be assessed on their ability to solve data analysis problems encountered in real office environments through mathematical modeling.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
